title: Increasing Conversion Rate from Demo Participants to Paid Customers
result: Increased conversion by 25% while maintaining customer satisfaction

actions.heading: Research & Analysis
items: Conducted interviews with 30+ demo participants who did not convert
Analyzed usage patterns from 500+ demo sessions to identify engagement metrics
Created conversion funnel visualization to pinpoint exact drop-off points

actions.heading: Strategy Implementation
items: Redesigned demo experience to focus on highest-value features first
Implemented personalized follow-up email sequence based on specific user interactions
Created targeted resources addressing common objections identified in research
Developed clear pricing comparison tools to improve transparency

actions.heading: Measurement & Optimization
items: Established A/B testing framework for continuous conversion optimization
Implemented real-time feedback collection during demo process
Created customer journey analytics dashboard for leadership
